testcase.name: Login
testcase.system-out: Given User navigate to "TapuHomepage".......................................passed Then Verify is homepage open................................................passed And Login to this site and Verify for successful login......................passed Given Navigate to the bottom of this site...................................passed Then Clickability is verify in the fields under the headings -Gayrimenkul Danismanlarimiz- and -Sozlesmeler-.passed And Verify whether the texts of the h1 tag on the redirected pages are the same as the previous page.passed
